alert.note: Alert for Central Utah West Desert; Color Country West Desert; Mojave Desert (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 30 at 1:38PM MDT until July 04 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 492, 495, AND 497... The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Saturday afternoon through Monday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 492 Central Utah West Desert, Fire Weather Zone 495 Color Country West Desert and Fire Weather Zone 497 Mojave Desert. * WINDS...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph Saturday afternoon through evening. South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph Sunday and Monday afternoon through evening. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Relative humidity falling into the 5 to 12 percent range, with marginal overnight recoveries of 20 to 30 percent. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions are likely to occur. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that there is a potential for critical fire weather conditions. Continue to monitor for the latest forecasts and for possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Central Utah West Desert; Color Country West Desert; Mojave Desert
